name: Santa Block Massacre
description:
Santa has been kidnapped by evil cubes! You, Jingly the Elf have decided to use e x c e s s i v e v i o l e n c e. Use arrows to move, hold X and use up & down to terraform, and use right click to pause.

There are three turret types, each with one upgrade.

  • The Tesla turret shoots at one enemy in line of sight, and its upgrade lets it fire faster
  • The Laser turret shoots at its column of spaces, even able to hit ghost enemies in the floor; Its upgrade allows it to hit 1 to the left of itself as well.
  • The Rocket turret shoots a projectile that deals splash damage, and its upgrade increases its firing speed drastically.
